name: Accursed Centaur
oracle_text: When Accursed Centaur enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
flavor_text:
"The Cabal mocks the natural order. For its minions, death is just a pause between duties."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

name: Airborne Aid
oracle_text: Draw a card for each Bird on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"We help our Southern Order comrades as much as we can. But the Cabal's insidious influence spreads, dividing our forces and leaving new arrivals to fend for themselves."
—Commander Eesha

name: Anurid Murkdiver
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Aphetto's swamps are alive with the dead.

name: Aphetto Dredging
oracle_text: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Phage became both executioner and savior, helping others to the same rebirth she had found.

name: Ascending Aven
oracle_text:
Flying
Ascending Aven can block only creatures with flying.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Backslide
oracle_text:
Turn target creature with a morph ability face down.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Some things are better left unknown.

name: Barkhide Mauler
oracle_text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Anywhere else they would be hunted for their skins, but in Wirewood, they are safe.

name: Barren Moor
oracle_text:
Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Battering Craghorn
oracle_text:
First strike
Morph {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: Their skeletons can be found all over Skirk Ridge, tangled in each other's horns.

name: Battlefield Medic
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Death never stops to rest. Neither can we."

name: Birchlore Rangers
oracle_text:
Tap two untapped Elves you control: Add one mana of any color.
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Break Open
oracle_text: Turn target face-down creature an opponent controls face up.
flavor_text: There are two ways to resolve puzzling situations: thoughtful contemplation or force. After thoughtful contemplation, most barbarians choose force.

name: Brightstone Ritual
oracle_text: Add {R} for each Goblin on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Wizards fought over the stone to exploit its power. Goblins fight over it because it's shiny.

name: Charging Slateback
oracle_text:
Charging Slateback can't block.
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: Goblins prize its hide for building rock sled runners.

name: Choking Tethers
oracle_text:
Tap up to four target creatures.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

name: Crafty Pathmage
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: The most valuable commodity in the pits is a way out.

name: Crown of Ascension
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Sacrifice Crown of Ascension: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Wisdom, clear my eyes."

name: Crown of Awe
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.
Sacrifice Crown of Awe: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain protection from black and from red until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Honor, guide my step."

name: Crown of Fury
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Sacrifice Crown of Fury: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Passion, fire my heart."

name: Crown of Suspicion
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Sacrifice Crown of Suspicion: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +2/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Darkness, hide my fear."

name: Crown of Vigor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Crown of Vigor: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Life, be my shield."

name: Cruel Revival
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

name: Daru Cavalier
oracle_text:
First strike
When Daru Cavalier enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Daru Cavalier, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Daru Healer
oracle_text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Daru Lancer
oracle_text:
First strike
Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: Although the Order frowned upon his preparations for the pits, behind closed doors most saw the fights as a necessary evil.

name: Daunting Defender
oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to a Cleric creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage.
flavor_text: "I will wield the stone of my homeland as though it were the fists of the Ancestor."

name: Defensive Maneuvers
oracle_text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +0/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Only on the battlefield can we repay all the Order has given us."

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "The truth will outshine all lies."

name: Dirge of Dread
oracle_text:
All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Disciple of Grace
oracle_text:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Dread was as foreign to her as the landscape ahead.

name: Disciple of Malice
oracle_text:
Protection from white
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The lantern he carried did not light his way—it signaled his approach.

name: Disruptive Pitmage
oracle_text:
{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: "Show weakness to hide your strength."

name: Dive Bomber
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Dive Bomber: It deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: "Your graves will lie beneath my final nest."

name: Elvish Guidance
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G} for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Old home never forgotten, new home ours forever."

name: Elvish Pathcutter
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Target Elf creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: In harsh times, the strongest currency is cooperation.

name: Elvish Pioneer
oracle_text: When Elvish Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Destruction is the work of an afternoon. Creation is the work of a lifetime."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

name: Elvish Warrior
flavor_text: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

name: Erratic Explosion
oracle_text: Choose any target. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Erratic Explosion deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that permanent or player. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Fallen Cleric
oracle_text:
Protection from Clerics
Morph {4}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: The most terrifying zombies are those with just a hint of their old selves left.

name: Festering Goblin
oracle_text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

name: Fever Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
• Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Fever Charm deals 3 damage to target Wizard creature.

name: Foothill Guide

Protection from Goblins
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: "Like any pests, goblins must be repelled quickly or they multiply."

name: Forgotten Cave
oracle_text:
Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Glory Seeker
flavor_text: The turning of the tide always begins with one soldier's decision to head back into the fray.

name: Goblin Sky Raider
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The goblin word for "flying" is more accurately translated as "falling slowly."

name: Goblin Sledder
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Let's play 'sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

name: Goblin Taskmaster
oracle_text:
{1}{R}: Target Goblin creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: For some reason, goblin fighting school isn't as crowded on day two.

name: Grassland Crusader
oracle_text: {T}: Target Elf or Soldier creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Gravel Slinger
oracle_text:
{T}: Gravel Slinger deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

Flying
Whenever Gustcloak Harrier becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

name: Gustcloak Runner
oracle_text: Whenever Gustcloak Runner becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

Whenever Haunted Cadaver deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, that player discards three cards.

"One wizard is a suspect. Two wizards are a conspiracy."

name: Ixidor's Will
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} for each Wizard on the battlefield.

oracle_text:
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Enchant creature

name: Lay Waste
oracle_text:
Destroy target land.

Enchant creature

Mistform Wall has defender as long as it's a Wall.

name: Nantuko Husk

flavor_text:
The soul sheds light, and death is its shadow. When the light dims, life and death embrace.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "From here, let the world be reborn."

name: Nosy Goblin

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

Enchant creature

Flying

Flying

oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Shepherd of Rot
oracle_text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Shock

flavor_text:
"I love lightning! It's my best invention since the rock."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

oracle_text:
Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls.

name: Skirk Prospector

Slipstream Eel can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

name: Swat
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.

name: Symbiotic Elf

name: Syphon Mind

flavor_text: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

name: Taunting Elf
oracle_text: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
flavor_text: The safety of the village depends on the beast thinking with its stomach.

name: Tranquil Thicket
oracle_text:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

flavor_text: No matter your strength, the Krosan Forest is stronger. No matter your speed, the Wirewood Forest is faster.

name: Trickery Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
• Target creature becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.

name: Unified Strike
oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of Soldiers on the battlefield.
flavor_text: The tall, reedy grass of the Daru Plains rustles loudly in the winds, a perfect cover for any ambush.

name: Vitality Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Regenerate target Beast.

name: Wave of Indifference
oracle_text: X target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Darius?"
"Yeah?"
"There's a goblin sneaking up on you."
"So?"
"Just sayin'."

name: Wellwisher
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

name: Wirewood Elf
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."

name: Wirewood Herald
oracle_text: When Wirewood Herald dies, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

name: Wirewood Pride
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Though you may leave this haven we have found, may our strength never leave you."

name: Wirewood Savage
oracle_text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"She is truly Wirewood's child now."
—Elvish refugee

name: Wretched Anurid
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: The only prince inside this frog is the one it ate.
